section.name: Mevenide Update
section.p:
To install Mevenide through the Eclipse Update Manager, create an Update Site [1] pointing to :
http://dist.codehaus.org/mevenide/release/eclipse/update/site.xml and follow instructions.
If this procedure it not suitable, you can download a big zip archive containing the feature and all the plugins. You just need to unzip it into your Eclipse install directory.
[1] Help > Software Updates > Find and Install... > Search for new features to install > Add update site...
